Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward  1
PW Police Jury -- 5.56 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of five and fifty-six hundredths (5.56) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $331,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, operating and/or maintaining public recreational facilities in and for Caldwell Parish, said millage to represent a seventeen hundredths of a mill (.17) increase over the 5.39 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on November 2, 2004?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Cons. School District #1 -- 8.90 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Consolidated School District Number One Proposition 
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District Number One of Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of eight and ninety hundredths (8.90) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $534,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of giving additional support for operations, maintenance and construction of public schools in the District, said millage to represent a twenty-eight hundredths of a mill (.28) increase over the 8.62 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on September 18, 2004?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drain. Dist. No. 1 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District Number One Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District Number One of the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $164,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintaining, constructing and improving drainage works within the territorial limits of the District for the benefit of the public?
